text: Overall the Charmers'trip to Key West trip to celebrate Cameran Eubanks'birthday was a success. Although the non - stop drinking and sun did take their toll on some, so back in Charleston once the gang was refreshed they reconvened at Sermet's farewell party. Check out the Charmers and their glamorous looks below... Southern Charm Naomie Opens up to Kathryn About Her Relationship With Craig And what she reveals is a bit surprising.
